00042 MasterClient::MasterClient(ConnectionManagerPtr &conn_mgr, Hyperspace::SessionPtr &hyperspace, time_t timeout, ApplicationQueuePtr &app_queue) : m_verbose(true), m_conn_manager_ptr(conn_mgr), m_hyperspace_ptr(hyperspace), m_app_queue_ptr(app_queue), m_timeout(timeout), m_initiated(false) {
00043 
00044   m_comm = m_conn_manager_ptr->get_comm();
00045   memset(&m_master_addr, 0, sizeof(m_master_addr));
00046 
00050   m_master_file_callback_ptr = new MasterFileHandler(this, m_app_queue_ptr);
00051   m_master_file_handle = 0;
00052   try {
00053     m_master_file_handle = m_hyperspace_ptr->open("/hypertable/master", OPEN_FLAG_READ, m_master_file_callback_ptr);
00054   }
00055   catch (Exception &e) {
00056     if (e.code() != Error::HYPERSPACE_FILE_NOT_FOUND && e.code() != Error::HYPERSPACE_BAD_PATHNAME)
00057       HT_THROW2(e.code(), e, e.what());
00058   }
00059 }

00063 MasterClient::~MasterClient() {
00064   m_hyperspace_ptr->close(m_master_file_handle);
00065 }

00072 int MasterClient::initiate_connection(DispatchHandlerPtr dhp) {
00073   m_dispatcher_handler_ptr = dhp;
00074   if (m_master_file_handle == 0)
00075     return Error::MASTER_NOT_RUNNING;
00076   try {
00077     reload_master();
00078   }
00079   catch (Exception &e) {
00080     return e.code();
00081   }
00082   return Error::OK;
00083 }

00087 int MasterClient::create_table(const char *tablename, const char *schemastr, DispatchHandler *handler) {
00088   CommBufPtr cbp(MasterProtocol::create_create_table_request(tablename, schemastr));
00089   return send_message(cbp, handler);
00090 }

00093 
00094 int MasterClient::create_table(const char *tablename, const char *schemastr) {
00095   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer sync_handler;
00096   EventPtr event_ptr;
00097   CommBufPtr cbp(MasterProtocol::create_create_table_request(tablename, schemastr));
00098   int error = send_message(cbp, &sync_handler);
00099   if (error == Error::OK) {
00100     if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr)) {
00101       if (m_verbose)
00102         HT_ERRORF("Master 'create table' error, tablename=%s : %s", tablename, MasterProtocol::string_format_message(event_ptr).c_str());
00103       error = (int)MasterProtocol::response_code(event_ptr);
00104     }
00105   }
00106   return error;
00107 }

00115 
00116 int MasterClient::get_schema(const char *tablename, std::string &schema) {
00117   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer sync_handler;
00118   EventPtr event_ptr;
00119   CommBufPtr cbp(MasterProtocol::create_get_schema_request(tablename));
00120   int error = send_message(cbp, &sync_handler);
00121   if (error == Error::OK) {
00122     if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr)) {
00123       if (m_verbose)
00124         HT_ERRORF("Master 'get schema' error, tablename=%s : %s", tablename,
00125                   MasterProtocol::string_format_message(event_ptr).c_str());
00126       error = (int)MasterProtocol::response_code(event_ptr);
00127     }
00128     else {
00129       const uint8_t *ptr = event_ptr->message + sizeof(int32_t);
00130       size_t remaining = event_ptr->message_len - sizeof(int32_t);
00131       schema = decode_vstr(&ptr, &remaining);
00132     }
00133   }
00134   return error;
00135 }

00138 int MasterClient::status() {
00139   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer sync_handler;
00140   EventPtr event_ptr;
00141   CommBufPtr cbp(MasterProtocol::create_status_request());

00143   if (error == Error::OK) {
00144     if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr)) {
00145       if (m_verbose)
00146         HT_ERRORF("Master 'status' error : %s", MasterProtocol::string_format_message(event_ptr).c_str());
00147       error = (int)MasterProtocol::response_code(event_ptr);
00148     }
00149   }
00150   return error;
00151 }

00238 
00239 int MasterClient::send_message(CommBufPtr &cbp, DispatchHandler *handler) {
00240   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00241   int error;
00242 
00243   if ((error = m_comm->send_request(m_master_addr, m_timeout, cbp, handler)) != Error::OK) {
00244     std::string addr_str;
00245     if (m_verbose)
00246       HT_WARNF("Comm::send_request to %s failed - %s", InetAddr::string_format(addr_str, m_master_addr), Error::get_text(error));
00247   }
00248 
00249   return error;
00250 }

00252 
00256 void MasterClient::reload_master() {
00257   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00258   int error;
00259   DynamicBuffer value(0);
00260   std::string addr_str;
00261 
00262   m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_get(m_master_file_handle, "address", value);
00263 
00264   addr_str = (const char *)value.base;
00265 
00266   if (addr_str != m_master_addr_string) {
00267 
00268     if (m_master_addr.sin_port != 0) {
00269       if ((error = m_conn_manager_ptr->remove(m_master_addr)) != Error::OK) {
00270         if (m_verbose)
00271           HT_WARNF("Problem removing connection to Master - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00272       }
00273       if (m_verbose)
00274         HT_INFOF("Connecting to new Master (old=%s, new=%s)", m_master_addr_string.c_str(), addr_str.c_str());
00275     }
00276 
00277     m_master_addr_string = addr_str;
00278 
00279     InetAddr::initialize(&m_master_addr, m_master_addr_string.c_str());
00280 
00281     m_conn_manager_ptr->add(m_master_addr, 15, "Master", m_dispatcher_handler_ptr);
00282   }
00283 
00284 }

00287 bool MasterClient::wait_for_connection(long max_wait_secs) {
00288   return m_conn_manager_ptr->wait_for_connection(m_master_addr, max_wait_secs);
00289 }
